cast.name: 维森特·M.沃德 Vincent M. Ward

introduction: Dylan Gamble is a straight-edged, undercover police officer working to take down a powerful crime organization called the Styles Syndicate. However, Dylan is fired before doing so. A year passes, Gamble has a new life and a new girlfriend by the name of Tanisha. Unfortunately, she is kidnapped by the Syndicate and Gamble must save her.He reluctantly gets the help of a small time crook named Hendrix Moon and Moon’s arch-rival, a mild-mannered moonwalker named Leslie Kindall. Will Dylan find his sweet thang, Tanisha? Will he be able to also take down the Syndicate? Can Moon and Leslie go the entire length of this film without killing one another? Find out more on New Jack Fury!
